subtitle: Feel free to contact me if you need more information.

input.title: Write to Me
input.name: Your Name
input.noName: Name cannot be empty. Please enter your name.
input.noEmail: Email address cannot be empty. Please enter your email.
input.noContent: Message cannot be empty. Please enter your message.
input.error: Failed to send email. Please contact me by phone. Thank you!
input.tooManyTry: Too close to the previous sending time. Please try again later. Thank you!
